item.title: Lotro (Lord of the Rings Online)
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

the elve age:

The archer class seems super OP, as in you don’t even have to completely face the NPC you’re targeting. Lame.

You have to face the NPC or you cant shoot the NPC, If you have played the game then you would know thats the Blue line class, Which allows you to freely roam and shoot. Your lame.

Read full topic
